name: iac-learn
postCreateCommand:
bash -lc 'curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && ~/.local/bin/uv sync --group dev && printf "#!/usr/bin/env bash
uv run awslocal "$@"
" | sudo tee /usr/local/bin/awslocal >/dev/null && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/awslocal && printf "#!/usr/bin/env bash
uv run tflocal "$@"
" | sudo tee /usr/local/bin/tflocal >/dev/null && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/tflocal'
